SELECT CNTRT_LOG_SEQ_NO , RANK() OVER( ORDER BY CNTRT_LOG_SEQ_NO) AS NO , CNTRT_ID , INS_DATE , INS_TIME , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(UPD_DATE || UPD_TIME , 'YYYYMMDD HH24MISS') , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_DATE , UPD_TIME , CNTRT_EDIT_COMMENT , INS_PERSON_ID , UPD_PERSON_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM GCOM.TADM_USER WHERE USER_ID = T1.INS_PERSON_ID) AS INS_PERSON_NM , (SELECT USER_NM FROM GCOM.TADM_USER WHERE USER_ID = T1.UPD_PERSON_ID) AS UPD_PERSON_NM
FROM GCMS.TCMS_CNTRT_LOG T1 WHERE CNTRT_ID = '20220803261085' ORDER BY T1.CNTRT_LOG_SEQ_NO DESC
